entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move tooling issues from aspnetcore -> aspnetcore-tooling #37112
  • Route constraints doesn't work in minimal Web API #37109
  • Blazor @key with dynamic column data #37108
  • Startup regression: plaintext #37107
  • ERROR Unable to load DLL 'Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SNI.dll' or one of its dependencies: Access is denied. #37106
  • Typos in React SPA template FetchData.js #37105
  • Blazor WASM AOT code is 1 to 1.5 orders of magnitude slower than native CLR #37104
  • React SPA template is cumbersome to use when adding new API routes due to the proxy requirement #37103
  • Templates with <Nullable>enable</Nullable> are very irritating to get started with #37099
  • Open- API issues for .NET7 Planning #37098
  • Consider adding 'SPA' keyword to all SPA templates (React, Angular, etc.) #37097
  • Packing Blazor Webassembly client excludes _framework folder #37095
  • Blazor WebAssembly SPA unauthorized when sending request to API which is hosted on http.sys with windows authentication #37093
  • Blazor and project level Nullable directive #37090
  • LinkGenerator.GetPathByName throws exception on inferred route name because method of the same name but different scope #37089
  • UseTokenLifeTime behavior clarification after testing #37087
  • Startup improvement: json #37086
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #37085
  • Blazor WASM Support running without server #37084
  • Test failure: `ShadowCopyE2EWorksWithOldFoldersPresent` #37081
    7.0-preview1
  • Test failure: `CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesFromMultipleConnectionsWithSameUser` #37080
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor wasm apps always running in production mode #37079

Closed

  • EventCallback type modifications don't re-trigger TagHelper resolution #36621
    17.0-Preview5
  • Embedded JavaScript doesn't get TextMate colorization in dark theme #36673
    17.0-Preview5
  • Directive completions seem to disappear with larger completion lists #36623
    17.0-Preview5
  • VS is slow to start making requests of Language Servers #31416
    17.0-Preview5
  • [WebToolsE2E]After creating ASP.NET Core Web App , open Layout.cshtml and type "<input asp-for = "Test“ />", the intellisense list also show #33418
    17.0-Preview5
  • HTML comment completion broken #35536
    17.0-Preview5
  • Issues with file name completions in Blazor app #34009
    17.0-Preview5
  • Unhandled exception. System.NotSupportedException: The environment changed. Changing the host configuration is not supported #36876
  • Response.Cookies.Append cannot set cookie value without encoding #36992
  • Results.Problem does not support configuring Extensions #36848
    6.0-rc2
  • Licence of AspnetCore 3.1 and 5? #37091
    Discussions
  • Question: Blazor WebAssembly project template in .Net 6, no more main method? #37072
    Discussions
  • Discussion: Guidance on using the new JavaScript Initializers in Blazor/.Net 6 #37078
  • .NET 6.0 RC1 on macOS Apple M1: Blazor WASM AOT build generates & serves both, large dotnet.wasm and all the .DLLs #37092
  • Epic: Minimal hosting and actions #32378
    6.0.0
  • Omnisharp + Razor Source generator = sad face #30750
    6.0.0
  • Modify ViewBag in Controller will cause RuntimeBinderException in 6.0.0-preview4 #33325
    6.0.0
  • Epic: Minimal API - OpenAPI features #34514
    6.0.0
  • Static web assets not being included with NuGet package #36847
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #37055
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #36083
  • Startup improvement: mvc #37054
  • Usage of IViewLocalizer with Html.PartialAsync #37058
  • Add RequireEntropy in PasswordOptions #34697
    Discussions
  • does not appear to contain CMakeLists.txt #34835
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Check solution filters #37114
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [Accessiblity] Set aria-current for manage nav #37110
    area-identity
  • Wait for Redis to be ready in tests #37102
    area-signalr
  • Un-skip SetSecrets #37101
    area-commandlinetools

Merged

  • Quarantine tests #37082
    area-runtime, area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • Revert consolidating DefaultViewCompilerProvider + DefaultViewCompiler #37037
    area-mvc, 6.0.0
  • Remove unused parameter and add requested comments #37077
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Harden another shadow copy test #37083
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Normalize startup test expected error codes #37076
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Try out BuildProjectReferences=false in Components #37017
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Add more details about helix payload #36665
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add doc for updating Major Version & TFM #37020
    area-infrastructure
  • Add source-index build job to pipeline #37028
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix setting of WebRootPath in WebApplication #37033
    area-web-frameworks
  • Backport 37009: Make title prerendering not interfere with svg titles #37019
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #37039
    area-runtime
